entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
